mapper.select: SELECT seq, camp_id, camp_no, click_id, pub_id, sub_pub_id, sub_param1, sub_param2, sub_param3, sub_param4, idfa, adid, rtime, ip FROM click_log WHERE seq=#{seq} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO click_log ( camp_id, camp_no, click_id, pub_id, sub_pub_id, sub_param1, sub_param2, sub_param3, sub_param4, idfa, adid, rtime, ip ) VALUES ( #{camp_id}, #{camp_no}, #{click_id}, #{pub_id}, #{sub_pub_id}, #{sub_param1}, #{sub_param2}, #{sub_param3}, #{sub_param4}, #{idfa}, #{adid}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{ip} )
